Exaggerate: The claim of "fraud during the 2020 US election" is exaggerated because the video actually shows alleged ballot-stuffing in Russia during their elections in 2018, not fraud in the US election.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as the video provided does not show any evidence of fraud in the 2020 US election.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is evidence of fraud during the 2020 US election without any factual basis.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is actually from the 2018 Russian elections, not the 2020 US election.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the video is being misrepresented and falsely attributed to the 2020 US election, when it is actually from a different election in a different country.
